verbs.description: [ARG0: The Washington Post] [ARGM-TMP: on Sunday] [V: published] [ARG1: a story about longtime Trump associate Roger Stone recalling a May 2016 meeting with a man calling himself Henry Greenberg -- a man with a heavy Russian accent who offered Stone money in exchange for political dirt on Hillary Clinton] .
